Container.Name: immich-image-cleaner
Container.Overview:
Immich Image Cleaner helps you identify and clean up screenshots, web cache files, and data recovery artifacts from your Immich photo library. Uses ML analysis to detect cleanup candidates with high confidence.
Features: • Detects screenshots, web cache, and data recovery artifacts • Uses existing Immich ML infrastructure • Beautiful web interface for bulk cleanup operations • Automatic updates via GitHub releases • Safe - only marks for deletion, you control all deletions

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port for accessing the Immich Image Cleaner

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Directory for storing analysis results and configuration

Config.Name: Immich Server URL
Config.Description: Your Immich server URL with /api suffix (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:2283/api)

Config.Name: Immich API Key
Config.Description: Your Immich API key (get from Immich Settings > Account Settings > API Keys)

Config.Name: Secret Key
Config.Description: Secret key for session security (change for production)
